form.label: Azure Findings
form.description: Service Security Posture Hardening Programme : v1.4

search.query:
$tkn_index$ $tkn_sourcetype$ $tkn_host$ $tkn_source$ (SSPHP_RUN=$ssphp_run_tkn|s$ AND ssphp_creation_time_epoch>$time_window_earliest_epoch$ AND ssphp_creation_time_epoch<$time_window_latest_epoch$) ssphp_level_1_display_name=$tkn_group|s$ AND ssphp_level_2_display_name=$tkn_service|s$
| eval ssphp_tech_contact_email=split(ssphp_tech_contact_email,"; ")
| fields SSPHP_RUN, ssphp_*

| inputlookup ssphp_resource_service_map.csv | search ssphp_resource_group!="mc*" | table ssphp_level_1_display_name, ssphp_level_2_display_name, ssphp_resource_group, ssphp_subscription, ssphp_subscription_display_name, ssphp_service_team
| search ssphp_level_1_display_name!="NO AZURE DATA AVAILABLE" | dedup ssphp_level_1_display_name | sort 0 ssphp_level_1_display_name | table ssphp_level_1_display_name

| search ssphp_level_1_display_name=$tkn_group|s$ AND ssphp_level_2_display_name!="NO AZURE DATA AVAILABLE" | dedup ssphp_level_2_display_name | sort 0 ssphp_level_2_display_name | table ssphp_level_2_display_name
| search (ssphp_level_1_display_name=$tkn_group|s$ AND ssphp_level_2_display_name=$tkn_service|s$) | dedup ssphp_subscription | table ssphp_subscription, ssphp_subscription_display_name

| search (ssphp_level_1_display_name=$tkn_group|s$ AND ssphp_level_2_display_name=$tkn_service|s$) AND ssphp_subscription=$tkn_subscription|s$ | dedup ssphp_resource_group | table ssphp_resource_group

| search (ssphp_level_1_display_name=$tkn_group|s$ AND ssphp_level_2_display_name=$tkn_service|s$) AND ssphp_subscription=$tkn_subscription|s$ AND ssphp_resource_group=$tkn_resource_group_id|s$ | dedup ssphp_service_team | table ssphp_service_team | sort 0 ssphp_service_team

| rest splunk_server=local /services/authentication/current-context
| eval roles=if(username="ian.pearl@education.gov.uk","dfe_ssphp_service_user_s184",roles) ```make ian a service user for testing```
| rex field=roles "^dfe_ssphp_service_user_(?<role_service>s\d{3})$" | eval isadmin=case(roles="sc_admin","1",roles="power","1",roles="dfe_ssphp_service_power",1,isnotnull(role_service),"0",1==1,"0")
| eval L1=case(isadmin="1","*", role_service="s184","Schools and School Performance", 1==1,"none"), L2=case(isadmin="1","*", role_service="s184","Regional Service Delivery", 1==1,"none")
| table roles, isadmin, username, L1, L2

| makeresults | eval "Number of Findings"=$eventcount_tkn$, "Number of Findings"=if(isnum('Number of Findings'),'Number of Findings',"N/A") | fieldformat "Number of Findings"=tostring('Number of Findings',"commas") | table "Number of Findings"

| inputlookup ssphp_last_ssphp_drop.csv | search ssphp_source="findings" | rename last_SSPHP_RUN as SSPHP_RUN
| eval search_earliest=SSPHP_RUN-3600, search_latest=SSPHP_RUN+3600 | eval "Last Findings Ingestion Time from Azure"=strftime(SSPHP_RUN,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S") | table "Last Findings Ingestion Time from Azure", SSPHP_RUN, search_earliest, search_latest

table.fields: "Last Findings Ingestion Time from Azure", SSPHP_RUN

search.query:
| search ssphp_severity="*High*" $healthy_tkn$
| fillnull value="-" ssphp_subscription, ssphp_resource_group, ssphp_resources_affected | eval ssphp_resources_affected="subscription = ".ssphp_subscription.", resource group = ".ssphp_resource_group.", resources affected = ".ssphp_resources_affected | stats dc(ssphp_resources_affected) as no_resources_affected, values(ssphp_resources_affected) as ssphp_resources_affected by ssphp_policy_name | sort 0 - no_resources_affected

panel.title: Resource Groups with most High Findings

search.query:
| search ssphp_severity="*High*" $healthy_tkn$
| stats dc(ssphp_policy_name) as ssphp_policies by ssphp_resource_group | sort 0 - ssphp_policies

| search ssphp_level_1_display_name=$tkn_group|s$ AND ssphp_level_2_display_name=$tkn_service|s$ AND ssphp_subscription=$tkn_subscription|s$ AND ssphp_resource_group=$tkn_resource_group_id|s$ AND ssphp_service_team=$tkn_service_team$ AND $healthy_tkn$ AND ssphp_severity=$tkn_severity|s$ AND ssphp_environment=$tkn_environment|s$
| table SSPHP_RUN, ssphp_creation_time, ssphp_last_changed_time, ssphp_tenant_name, ssphp_subscription, ssphp_resource_group, ssphp_resources_affected, ssphp_environment, ssphp_status, ssphp_policy_name, ssphp_policy_description, ssphp_remediation, ssphp_severity, ssphp_impact, ssphp_user_impact, ssphp_tactics, ssphp_techniques, ssphp_threats, ssphp_service_team, ssphp_tech_contact_email, ssphp_event_uid | rename ssphp_creation_time as "Finding Creation Time", ssphp_last_changed_time as "Finding Last Changed Time", ssphp_subscription as "Subscription", ssphp_resource_group as "Resource Group", ssphp_resources_affected as "Resources Affected", ssphp_status as "Status", ssphp_policy_name as "Policy Name", ssphp_policy_description as "Policy Description", ssphp_remediation as "Remediation Recommendations", ssphp_severity as "Severity", ssphp_impact as "Impact", ssphp_user_impact as "User Impact", ssphp_tactics as "Tactics", ssphp_techniques as "Techniques", ssphp_threats as "Threats", ssphp_tenant_name as "Tenant", ssphp_environment as "Environment", ssphp_service_team as "Service Team", ssphp_tech_contact_email as "Technical Contacts"
| eventstats count

table.fields: ["Finding Creation Time","Finding Last Changed Time","Tenant","Subscription","Resource Group","Resources Affected","Environment","Status","Policy Name","Policy Description","Severity","Tactics","Techniques","Threats","Service Team","Technical Contacts"]

| table search_string

input.label: Resources that have become Healthy - Remediated
New Resources that are NOT Healthy
Resources that were Healthy but now Unhealthy
Resources that were previously Unhealthy but no longer exist

search.query:
| multisearch
[search $tkn_index$ $tkn_sourcetype$ $tkn_host$ $tkn_source$ SSPHP_RUN=$ssphp_run_tkn$ earliest=$search_earliest_tkn$ latest=$search_latest_tkn$ ssphp_level_1_display_name=$tkn_group|s$ AND ssphp_level_2_display_name=$tkn_service|s$ AND ssphp_subscription=$tkn_subscription|s$ AND ssphp_resource_group=$tkn_resource_group_id|s$ AND ssphp_service_team=$tkn_service_team$ $healthy_tkn$ AND ssphp_severity=$tkn_severity|s$ AND ssphp_environment=$tkn_environment|s$
| eval finding=coalesce(ssphp_sub_assessment_id,ssphp_assessment_id) | rename ssphp_* as ssphp_current_*]
[search $tkn_index$ $tkn_sourcetype$ $tkn_host$ $tkn_source$ $checkpoint_search_text_tkn$ ssphp_level_1_display_name=$tkn_group|s$ AND ssphp_level_2_display_name=$tkn_service|s$ AND ssphp_subscription=$tkn_subscription|s$ AND ssphp_resource_group=$tkn_resource_group_id|s$ AND ssphp_service_team=$tkn_service_team$ $healthy_tkn$ AND ssphp_severity=$tkn_severity|s$ AND ssphp_environment=$tkn_environment|s$
| eval finding=coalesce(ssphp_sub_assessment_id,ssphp_assessment_id) | rename ssphp_* as ssphp_checkpoint_*]
| table SSPHP_RUN, timing, finding, ssphp_* | stats values(*) as * by finding
| fillnull value="-" ssphp_checkpoint_status, ssphp_current_status | where NOT ('ssphp_current_status'='ssphp_checkpoint_status' OR ('ssphp_checkpoint_status'="-" AND 'ssphp_current_status'="Healthy") OR ('ssphp_checkpoint_status'="Healthy" AND 'ssphp_current_status'="-"))
| eval type=case('ssphp_current_status'="Healthy","1", ```remediated``` 'ssphp_checkpoint_status'="-" AND 'ssphp_current_status'!="Healthy","2", ```new unhealthy``` 'ssphp_checkpoint_status'="Healthy" AND 'ssphp_current_status'!="Healthy","3", ```was healthy but no longer healthy``` 'ssphp_checkpoint_status'!="Healthy" AND 'ssphp_current_status'!="-","4" ```was unhealthy but resource no longer exists``` )
| search $search_string_tkn$
| eval "Finding Creation Time"=coalesce('ssphp_current_creation_time','ssphp_checkpoint_creation_time'), "Finding Last Changed Time"=coalesce('ssphp_current_last_changed_time','ssphp_checkpoint_last_changed_time'), "Subscription"=coalesce('ssphp_current_subscription','ssphp_checkpoint_subscription'), "Resource Group"=coalesce('ssphp_current_resource_group','ssphp_checkpoint_resource_group'), "Resources Affected"=coalesce('ssphp_current_resources_affected','ssphp_checkpoint_resources_affected'), "Environment"=coalesce('ssphp_current_environment','ssphp_checkpoint_environment'), "Severity"=coalesce('ssphp_current_severity','ssphp_checkpoint_severity'), "Policy Name"=coalesce('ssphp_current_policy_name','ssphp_checkpoint_policy_name'), "Policy Description"=coalesce('ssphp_current_policy_description','ssphp_checkpoint_policy_description')
| search $tkn_view_5$
| rename ssphp_checkpoint_status as "Checkpoint Status", ssphp_current_status as "Current Status"
| table SSPHP_RUN, finding, type, "Finding Creation Time", "Finding Last Changed Time", "Subscription", "Resource Group", "Resources Affected", "Environment", "Severity", "Checkpoint Status", "Current Status", "Policy Name", "Policy Description" | sort 0 - "Finding Creation Time", "Finding Last Changed Time"
| eventstats count

table.fields: "Finding Creation Time", "Finding Last Changed Time", "Subscription", "Resource Group", "Resources Affected", "Environment", "Severity", "Checkpoint Status", "Current Status", "Policy Name", "Policy Description"
